subject: Re: Order emails with PDF's not coming through to Hello inbox
preview: Joel you hero! Yep, we have received them and those are the correct ones.  Thanks very much for doing this and sending them through appreciate the help with this.  Thanks,    SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLE

full_threads.body:
Joel you hero! Yep, we have received them and those are the correct ones.

Thanks very much for doing this and sending them through appreciate the help with this.

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Sean,

We have resent the RFP emails. Let me know if you have received it?

Hi Joel,

I have received these emails. However these are the emails that confirm we have received the order there should be another email before this one that has a PDF of their order attached is there a way to find those emails?

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
(Time: 60mins)

Hi Sean,

I hope all is well.

We have resent the emails, Can you confirm if you have received it?

Hi Joel,

The below jobs are the three that we missed the order emails for:

HC120-01398 - 38 Lindley Avenue, Narrabeen 2101

HC120-01400 - U 23, 4-14 Watson St, Neutral Bay

HC120-01399 - 10 Olsen Street Guildford NSW 2161

If you need any more info regarding when these order's came through or anything let me know.

Thanks,



SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Sean,

I hope all is well.

Thanks for cc'ing us on the email. When you get a moment, could you please send through the details of the last order you received? We’ll be manually triggering the order emails from our end.

Thanks in advance!

Hi Joel,

Perfect I will send them a separate message and see if they can do this.

Thanks again for your help with this one.

Thanks,



SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Sean,

That's great to hear! Since the emails are backed up, let's check with Lanter to see if they have any email logs from the past couple of days that they can resend. That should help recover any missed messages from recent order placements.

Hi Joel,

I have just tested it, and it seems to be working again now.

Is there anyway we can recover some of the emails that we should have received when orders were placed by clients over the past couple of days?

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
(Time: 60mins)

Hi Sean,

I hope all is well.

Would you be able to check now and run a quick test to see if it’s working? Lanter has provided the updated passwords.

Let me know how you go.

Thanks Joel appreciate your help with this so far.

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Sean,

Thanks for that, if they have access they may be able to generate or reauthenticate it from their end as well.

Hi Joel,

I have spoken to Amy my manager and we don't have access to this however I have looped in Lanter who help with our website difficulties so just seeing if this is something they can help with gaining access to sort it out.

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Joel,

I don't think I have access to this but I have just forwarded your email to Amy to see if she can jump in and give you access.

Thanks,



SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Sean,

I hope all is well

We’ve looked into the issue further and identified that the Outlook SMTP authentication has expired.

Would you happen to have access to the Azure portal? If so, could you please add support@wolfiq.com.au as a user so we can proceed with the necessary updates?
@cindy @andy @victoriaV Upon checking further, we need to re authenticate the microsoft outlook.

Hi Andy,

Thaks for looking into it.

If possible could we make this an urgent matter as the emails not going out to clients or coming to us massively affects us completing orders for clients.

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
hello@huntleyandco.com.au HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

@cindy - here is path to resolution . They need to renew the plugin.

@victoriaV in checking I believe.

Hi Sean,

Apologies for the delay on this - our team is still looking into.

We will have another update later today.

Sounds good. I've pinged @joel

(Time: 15mins)
